attributes.action: stop disabled and chronicly sick living in poverty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
disabled people have it hard enough and they are kept in poverty/on the bread line with a high cost of living and unable to work and destined to a life of poverty on income support and no way out for the whole family, even severe disabled premium is given in one hand and taken away if you have a carer, cannot afford to live anywhere close to normal, unable to get or replace vital pieces of funiture, could you live with your clothes in black bin liners, on income support you are not even entitled to wardrobes, chest of draws,carpets,curtains,and other things everyone else takes for granted.Are we  sub human?
What kind of a way is that to bring up children when you live in an empty shell.
